author: asr1325
message: fix(curriculum): tabindex issue in checkout page (#57838)

files.patch:
@@ -21,7 +21,6 @@ Fulfill the user stories below and get all the tests to pass to complete the lab 1. You should have an input with an `id` and `name` of `card-name` within your form and a `label` associated with it. 1. You should have an input with an `id` and `name` of `card-number` within your form and a `label` associated with it. 1. At least two of your input elements should be required and have an `aria-required` attribute set to `true`. -1. You should use `tabindex` at least once. # --hints-- @@ -107,12 +106,6 @@ const requiredInputs = Array.from(inputs).filter(input => input.required && inpu assert.isAtLeast(requiredInputs?.length, 2) ``` -You should use `tabindex` at least once. - -```js -const els = document.querySelectorAll('[tabindex]'); -assert.isAtLeast(els.length, 1); -``` # --seed-- @@ -160,7 +153,7 @@ assert.isAtLeast(els.length, 1);
